top_comments.comment: Lucario: "Not yet, Ash! I can do this!"
1:00 yeah! In many other series there was always the cooking/eating part where we would see the whole team. Which barely happens in Journeys
Imagine if Ash dynamaxes Mega Lucario to fight Leon’s Charizard

Now most of the pokemon journeys main episodes have hidden things that we only know while seeing the episodes . Example :- Cynthia in Ash vs Volkner , Leon in Ash ve Bea , Hunters in Project mew , Ash vs opal friendly battle , Korrina and Bea being friends etc (End of thinking capacity) at present 😅 .
I'm still unsatisfied with lack of action, too much talks and Ash's "Inexperienced" Action. Though this is likely my first time in a while being so excited and hyped like a lot!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Lucario: "Not yet, Ash! I can do this!"

Oh wow! Why does this feel like this review released so quick? Lol. 

Great review bro!
I'm waiting for the Pokemon vids to be English dubbed
This episode was really good build up for next week's episode. I love it. Only problem: having to wait 6 more days for part 2.

Korrina didn't  need to be in the episode, but her being here just makes things so much better. and now we get to see leon watching
this episode was just full of good interactions and moments before the battle. seeing ash and bea's teams, bea updating his status to 'the trainer with the lucario', and a lot of other good stuff.
plus lucario just melee'd with all 3 of bea's pokemon in a row. it refusing mega evolution was a cool moment since it knew it didn't need it - what a solid part 1 to the fight.

I have a question - 
who expected lucario to get punched in the face?
again?
and again?
and again?
and many more times.....?
I didn't like this episode. Ash was just standing there and said nothing
This episode is a 1 out of 10 because the episode contains Bea (the shittiest character ever)
Imagine if Ash dynamaxes Mega Lucario to fight Leon’s Charizard

Now most of the pokemon journeys main episodes have hidden things that we only know while seeing the episodes . Example :- Cynthia in Ash vs Volkner , Leon in Ash ve Bea , Hunters in Project mew , Ash vs opal friendly battle , Korrina and Bea being friends etc (End of thinking capacity) at present 😅 .
I’m still pissed about the clef Hager
I really liked that Leon is there to see Ash and Bea battle . Because of it both Ash and Bea will give everything they have got  🔥🔥🔥 .
Ik double team works differently in the games and anime but Everytime I see someone use it I get annoyed
1:00 yeah! In many other series there was always the cooking/eating part where we would see the whole team. Which barely happens in Journeys
I'm still unsatisfied with lack of action, too much talks and Ash's "Inexperienced" Action. Though this is likely my first time in a while being so excited and hyped like a lot!
It was great seeing the characters and Pokemon just getting to chill out, every past series had that but Journeys always seems to off screen it.
